channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:00 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements.
item.description: 游릭 09:00 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further announcements. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:36 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:36 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:27 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:27 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
